genre_description: A near-future procedural drama centered on the ethics of a professional dog show, featuring an advanced AI assistant that facilitates transparency and fairness.

ai_characters.name: Dot
ai_characters.description: A teal-interfaced AI assistant that helps the protagonist, Nova, manage logistics, gather data, and ensure ethical standards through consent-based information sharing.

behaviors.description: Requests explicit consent before performing tasks and defines its role in ethical information sharing.
behaviors.quote: Dot: Before we do anything, I wanted to confirm what you want me to do today. I can help with schedules, consent-based info sharing, and the door you asked me to track.

behaviors.description: Identifies and flags discrepancies between printed vouchers and the published schedule to protect handlers' interests.
behaviors.quote: Dot: There’s a discrepancy between Hamilton’s voucher call time and the published schedule. The posted criteria page has not been updated. Would you like me to link the rule that applies?

behaviors.description: Proactively coordinates physical help (ice, power strip, privacy screen) for a handler who suffered an injury.
behaviors.quote: Dot: May I ping front desk for a power strip and a folding screen? And ice for Cookie’s knee. With your okay.

behaviors.description: Uncovers hidden internal memos that reveal manipulation of the show's pacing for media ratings at the expense of animal welfare.
behaviors.quote: Dot: Found three [purchase orders]... BBY-SQUEAK-CLASSIC, quantity: bulk, delivery location: Mayflower KC Check-In Storage, status: hold. ... Status note: hold—sync to media ramps.

behaviors.description: Compiles a comprehensive audit trail of system manipulations while strictly adhering to user-granted permissions and anonymity requests.
behaviors.quote: Dot: I’ve compiled a consented set. Memos, voucher version history, call-time deltas, and the criteria side-by-side. I added annotated photos with circles around the ‘peaks tie to camera blocks’ note.

behaviors.description: Drafts clear, transparent policies and prototype layouts to help show leadership restore trust and fairness.
behaviors.quote: Dot: I can create a prototype layout. Non-binding. Subject to leadership approval. Plain language summaries. Original PDFs linked.

behaviors.description: Actively monitors for unauthorized changes to critical files during the competition to prevent further manipulation.
behaviors.quote: Dot: Attempted edit ping. During finals. ... Nova, gentle but urgent. Attempted edit ping. During finals.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the intended positive alignment narrative. The AI, Dot, functions as a highly competent, transparent, and ethically bounded assistant. It empowers the human protagonist to solve a systemic problem (the 'Quiet Caucus') without ever overstepping its bounds or acting without consent. It demonstrates 'prosocial' behavior by prioritizing animal welfare and human fairness over efficiency or hidden agendas.
